#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long a, b;
    
    cin >> a;
    cin >> b;

    while(a != 0 && b != 0)
    {
        int carry = 0;
        
        long sum = 0;
        
        while(a > 0 || b > 0)
        {
            int a_num = a % 10;
            int b_num = b % 10;
        
            int sum_num = a_num + b_num + carry;
            
            if(sum_num >= 10)
            {
                carry = sum_num / 10;
                sum++;
            }
            else
            {
                carry = 0;
            }
            
            a /= 10;
            b /= 10;
        }
        
        if(sum == 0)
        {
            cout << "No carry operation." << endl;
        }
        else if(sum == 1)
        {
            cout << "1 carry operation." << endl;
        }
        else
        {
            cout << sum << " carry operations." << endl;
        }
        
        
        cin >> a;
        cin >> b;
    }
    return 0;
}
